name: The Artist of Masks - a wanderhome playbook
name_original: The Artist of Masks - a wanderhome playbook
description:
Most kith here are fundamentally good, but your masks can tell a cautionary tale of those who are not. Hide your features and tell your truth. 

You are alive. Your care is tangible, reflective, and able to be seen through a crowd.

This is dedicated to the faculty at Accademia dell’Arte and the family Patrick found there.

The Artist of Masks Playbook draws directly from Commedia dell’Arte, a theatre form developed in Italy that utilizes masks. This form takes a range of flexible stock characters and emphasizes their physicality through broad gestures and distinct masks. In telling a story, all the audience members are able to connect with a figure on stage and easily follow the plot, transcending language barriers through the actor’s expressive motions.

Find the base game, Wanderhome, here! 

If you love the lizard illustration so much that you want a sticker or whatnot, you can support the illustrator and find more of their work here!
